channel.title: Turbidites on Zoltán Sylvester
channel.description: Recent content in Turbidites on Zoltán Sylvester

item.title: Turbidite bed thickness distributions: methods and pitfalls of analysis and modelling
item.description: This paper presents statistical methods for analyzing turbidite bed thickness distributions and discusses the shortcomings of frequently applied techniques. Published in *Sedimentology*, 2007.
